data.title: Pink Hands of Hope could use some help!
data.meta_description: We always hear people say how can I give back? Well here may be a great opportunity for someone to make a difference and such a wonderful organization. Pink Hands of Hope We’ve helped over 5000 women in Central PA It takes a lot to run a successful non profit We are looking for a […]
data.text:
We always hear people say how can I give back? Well here may be a great opportunity for someone to make a difference and such a wonderful organization.

Pink Hands of Hope

We’ve helped over 5000 women in Central PA

It takes a lot to run a successful non profit

We are looking for a few more volunteers.

We need help sorting clothes, running the register and office help.

If you are interested sign up below:

https://www.pinkhandsofhope.org/volunteer

The gift of time is precious and we appreciate your consideration.
